topic.title: Replacing Nodes
topic.abstract: If you need to do maintenance and swap out nodes, this section contains steps to do that.If you need to do maintenance and swap out nodes, this section contains steps to do that.

body.p: You must ensure your device model aligns with your node configuration at all times. If you remove a device from a server, it may lead to renaming of devices on your system either immediately, or following a reboot or rescan, and you may invalidate your device model. In the case that maintenance is needed, follow the documented procedures for replacement of disk drives so that the device model remains accurate.
